Dear Parent_E,

Thank you for checking in, and I appreciate your continued interest in Nursery_C.

At the moment, our remaining place is being kept available in line with our priority order in case higher-priority families approach us. We can’t reserve the spot for any one family while that possibility remains.

That said, there is a scenario where we could reconsider: if higher-priority families do not apply to Nursery_C (or they secure places elsewhere) and the place is still open, we would then be able to revisit applications in our remaining priority order. If you would like, you can message us again with an [APPLY] later in the process to check whether the place is still available at that time.

Thank you again for your patience and understanding.
